Package client

package client
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AssignmentViewer
    Allows a teacher user to view all of the assignments in a classroom or create a new assignment for the classroom.
    HomeScreen
    A Screen that models the startup screen of a student or a teacher.
    Main
    Client App main method
    SelectAssignmentScreen
    Shows a screen that allows the user to choose from an assignment to submit to.
    StudentScreen
    The screen for the students.
    StudentSubmissionScreen
    The StudentClassroomScreen class allows a student to view their past assignments and an option to create a new submission.
    SubmissionScreen
    Creates a screen to make a submission to a particular assignment in a classroom that has been selected in the GUI
    TeacherScreen
    Models the Teacher GUI.
    TeacherSubmissionViewer
    Allows a teacher t0 view all of the submissions that have been made to a particular assignment in a classroom.
    ViewSubmissionScreen
    Allows a user to view a submission.
